discourse_list.title: I\xe2\x80\x99m new here - Where should I share a cool Dai adoption directory I built?

content.content: I’ve built a nice geodirectory platform of businesses around the globe accepting Crypto, and I’ve created a nice interactive geodirectory of businesses accepting Dai as payment. Crypto-friendly businesses will definitely want to be listed on my website (which is free and takes about 5 minutes). What and where is a non-spammy way for me to share it here? I don’t want to get banned for sharing a link here… Thanks!
Welcome! Feel free to post a link so we can check it out.
Go ahead and share it, I’d like to see it. I leave here a similar idea, but it is from Venezuela and includes other cryptos). https://www.criptolugares.io/PlaceListing
This site (https://cryptoavisos.com/buscar-comercios/) is from Argentina, is a ebay like site, but also have a commercial directory section, most of them accept Dai as payment.

Yep, here it is…  MarketplaceGOLD    Where Dai is Accepted Locally and Globally Dai is the stable ethereum-based decentralized currency that does not discriminate, each token is worth one US dollar.       Dai is the stable ethereum-based decentralized currency that does not discriminate, each token is worth one US dollar. Being stable it’s appealing to businesses, large and small, who accept it as payment for a plethora of services and products - from aromatherapy essential oils diffusers to French scented candles.
Looks good, is Dai popular in Venezuela?
Great for the Spanish speaking world!

I would not know exactly, it is accepted in very popular chain stores (imagine a walmart but Venezuelan), small merchants do not accept it. In Venezuela it is not very common to see people paying in crypto, they use it as a reserve of value in the face of hyperinflation so it is money that is not touched.

Venezuela, because of binance’s P2P is more populous USDT, but even so DAI has carved out a small niche in the DEFI-loving public. In fact Venezuela is an economy that in a non-legal way, the DOLAR in cash is the most widely used currency in the country.
JLivingston:  Great for the Spanish speaking world!   Thanks to the salavador, many crypto communities are on the train to learn Spanish, jack dorsey is on that hehehehe
